mapper.select: SELECT idx AS 'external_service_idx',url AS 'url',name AS 'name' FROM external_service;
SELECT * FROM external_service WHERE name LIKE #{name};
SELECT * FROM user_external_service WHERE user_idx = #{userIdx} AND external_service_idx = #{externalServiceIdx};

SELECT idx AS'external_service_detail_idx',name AS 'name', if_achieve AS 'if_achieve' FROM external_service_detail ed INNER JOIN user_external_service u ON ed.external_service_idx = u.external_service_idx AND ed.idx = u.external_service_detail_idx WHERE u.user_idx = #{userIdx} AND u.external_service_idx = #{externalServiceIdx};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_external_service WHERE user_idx = #{userIdx} AND external_service_idx = #{externalServiceIdx};
